name: Cottage Time Public House
text:
ALL DAY BREAKFAST

Substitute Toast for Bannock 2 / Substitute Hash Browns for Tomato Slices 1.50

COTTAGERS CLASSIC 2 eggs, 2 bacon, sausage, ham, or fried bologna, hash browns & toast 9.95

LOTW BREAKFAST 3 eggs, 2 bacon, sausage, ham, or fried bologna, hash browns & toast 14.95

BANNOCK BREAKFAST SANDWICH Fried egg, cheese, bacon, sliced tomato & chipotle sauce on a Bannock bun 8.50

BISON OMELETTE 3 eggs, tomato, onions, peppers, cheese, bison 14.95

PORRIDGE Oatmeal, candied pecans, berries & brown sugar 7.95

EGGS BENEDICT 2 poached eggs on English muffin with hollandaise sauce & hash browns 14.95

BUILD YOUR OWN OMELETTE 3 egg omelette, served with hash browns & toast Starting at 8.95 .75 each: Red Onion, Green Onion, Peppers, Tomato, Mushroom, Jalapeño, Cheese, Parmesan Cheese 3.00 each: Bacon, Bison, Ham

BANNOCK + JAM Fried Bannock with homemade blueberry jam 4.00

BNB PANCAKES 3 blueberry and bacon pancakes with choice of bacon, sausage, ham or fried bologna 15.50

CLASSIC PANCAKES 3 pancakes with choice of bacon, sausage, ham or fried bologna 12.95 Add blueberries +2

BREAKFAST POUTINE 2 eggs, hash browns, bacon bits, green onion, diced tomato, shredded cheese, hollandaise sauce 14.50

EXTRAS Side of Bacon 3 One Egg 3 Side of Toast 3 Hash Browns 3 Extra Cheese 2 Extra Hollandaise 2

BEVERAGES BOTTOMLESS COFFEE Regular / Decaf 3.25 SOFT DRINKS 2.50 $1 refills for the following: TEA 3.25 MILK 3.25 JUICE 3.25 Apple, Orange, Cranberry, Lemonade

House Favourite Gluten Free Vegetarian Parties of 8 or more are automatically subject to 18% gratuity on bill

Shareables

Bannock Bruschetta: With fresh tomato basil, roasted garlic & shredded parmesan $14.95

Walleye Bites: Crispy panko crusted walleye served with tartar $16.95

Poutine: Homemade fries, gravy & cheese curds $11.95

Three-Sister's Hummus: With fresh Bannock $12.95

Chicken Wings: $18.50

Choice of Sauce: Hot, Spicy Thai, Salt & Pepper, Cajun, Dry Garlic, Lemon Pepper, Teriyaki, Chef's Flavour

Homemade Fries: Cut and seasoned in house $7.95

Substitute Kettle Chips or Sweet Potato Fries $8.95

Soup of the Day: With Bannock $9.95

Salads

Caesar Salad: With crispy bacon, parmesan cheese, Bannock croutons & fresh lemon

Full $18.95 | Half $9.95

House Salad: With tender greens, field tomato, cucumber, feta cheese, candied pecans, topped with blueberry vinaigrette dressing

Full $17.95 | Half $9.95

Add Chicken: Full +$5 | Half +$2.50

HANDHELDS

Montreal Smoked Meat Smoked meat served on marble rye, with Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, mustard and pickles $22.95

Bison Dip Sandwich Roasted pulled bison; Swiss cheese, and fried onions with garlic aioli on a bun, served with au jus $21.95

Chicken Caesar Wrap Chicken with romaine, parmesan cheese, bacon & house Caesar $19.95

Bison Burger 5 oz pure bison served on a bannock bun, topped with blueberry sauce & brie cheese $23.95

Bacon Cheeseburger 5 oz pure beef served on brioche bun, topped with lettuce, tomato, bacon & cheese $17.95

Chicken Fingers Hand breaded chicken fingers with choice of sauce $17.95 Sauces: BBQ, Honey Dill, Crunchy Mustard, Ranch Tossed in Hot Sauce $1

Fish & Chips Crispy panko crusted walleye served with tartar sauce $21.95

Walleye Tacos Crispy panko crusted walleye, shredded slaw, tomato, pickled red onion, chipotle sauce & fresh lime $24.95

Pulled Bison Tacos Roasted pulled bison, slaw, diced tomato, pickled red onion & chipotle sauce $24.95

Walleye Dinner Crispy panko crusted walleye served with wild rice casserole, baked bean, slaw & tartar sauce $27.95

SIDES / UPGRADES Homemade Fries Kettle Chips Cup of Soup Sweet Potato Fries +3 Poutine +4 Side Caesar Salad +5 Side House Salad +3 Gravy / Extra Sauce +2
